meanings.definition: The quality of being full of windings and intricate turnings.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuosities of the maze made it challenging to find the way out.
meanings.sent2: The anfractuosities of the river created a beautiful and meandering path.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuosities of the tangled wires amused the curious toddler.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts followed the anfractuosities of a labyrinth, never reaching a clear conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The anfractuosities of the ancient tree roots were like a map of hidden secrets.

meanings.definition: A winding or intricate feature or quality.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuosities of the seashell fascinated the young biologist.
meanings.sent2: The anfractuosities of the old building's architecture were admired by all.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuosities of the plot in the movie kept the audience guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: Her speech had the anfractuosities of a river, flowing smoothly yet full of hidden depths.
meanings.sent5: The anfractuosities of the mountain range were a sight to behold from the valley below.

meanings.definition: A winding or intricate path or course.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuosities of the hiking trail led them through the dense forest.
meanings.sent2: The anfractuosities of the road through the countryside offered scenic views.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuosities of the roller coaster track thrilled the riders with unexpected turns.
meanings.sent4: Life's journey is full of anfractuosities, each turn leading to new experiences.
meanings.sent5: Navigating the anfractuosities of the city streets can be both exciting and confusing.
